description: Reporting service that aggregates findings, enriches them with CVE/CWE context, and surfaces prioritized remediation steps via signed exports.
steps: Define reporting schema that includes severity, confidence, CVE/CWE IDs, and evidence references
Generate JSON/CBOR exports and integrate with SOAR/SIEM hooks
Add report download endpoints secured by OAuth tokens and signed URLs
Prioritize findings by confidence, criticality, and policy compliance
Include export generation tests and validate artifact access gating
acceptance_criteria: Reports list the relevant CVEs/CWEs and recommended mitigations
Exports can be downloaded only over OAuth-protected endpoints
Prioritization honors policy directives and highlights drifts
